column4: hi. is there a statically compiled openvpn client anywhere? I need vpn to get to the net on ubuntu. thanks
or can someone tell me exactly what packages i need to download to make a dpkg -i openvpn work?
what problem are you having getting openvpn installed? why can't you just use apt to install it?
well, i can pastebin the depends.. or maybe just pm you if you want
